website_summaries.verdict: These strips are affordable, but many competitors offer longer-lasting results without complaints of being uncomfortable.
pros: Customers praise these fast-acting strips, which produce noticeable results after the first use
cons: A small number of customers cautioned that these strips were uncomfortable on their teeth

customer_reviews.title: White strips
customer_reviews.text: I have used the product for three days and can already see a difference! My teeth are noticeably whiter. The strips don't taste bad either kinda minty. I would really recommend this product for anyone. Its also reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: jamie videgain

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worked as described. I'll be buying this next time I want a whitening and don't want to zap my teeth with weird chemicals or light spectrums.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: I think it works better than crest whitestrips but they are so thin
customer_reviews.text: I think it works better than crest whitestrips but they are so thin, and don't adhere as well. tricky to apply but the result is better
customer_reviews.author: beckyp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price. They work just as well as the more well known brands.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: This product did not do what it said it was ...
customer_reviews.text: This product did not do what it said it was suppose to do. I was very upset with the item. It didn't even turn my teeth any shades whiter. Please do not waist your time or your money.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again, wish they were available on subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: Work great and can't beat the price. Work just as well as crest white strips if not better. Been using for a week and no sensitivity and nori only whiter.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Find a better product.
customer_reviews.text: Have used all strips and have noticed no difference. Find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Whitening Strips
customer_reviews.text: They do exactly what they should do. For the price you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ramseur

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money! I paid $32.00 for three boxes, and they can't be returned. No choice but to throw them in the trash. 100% my fault for trying to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: NOT AS GOOD AS ONES I USED LAST YEAR...THESE ARE KINDA A MOST STICKY
customer_reviews.author: BTIGER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and easy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very easy to apply. I tried crest white dental strips and this is so much easier to put on and effective and at a great price. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works great! The first time I used it I noticed ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great! The first time I used it I noticed an immediate difference. However, the only drawback is that the gel part feels very thick when you take the strip off.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam Japaridze

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer of this product, so I'll reserve judgement for later.
customer_reviews.author: Gene S. Young

customer_reviews.title: These somewhat work. They whiten your teetg slightly but ...
customer_reviews.text: These somewhat work. They whiten your teetg slightly but only for a temporary time (less than a day and then the process starts over when you do it again).
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Ramos

customer_reviews.title: All good reviews are scams
customer_reviews.text: Awful product, do not bother with buying. All good reviews are scams.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Crest, just read the directions (details in description)
customer_reviews.text: This brand was A LOT better than "3d Crest" The crest strips would constantly fall off and I had a problem with putting them on. This brand has no issues in applying them to my teeth. My only problem is that both companies make the bottom strip significantly smaller. This causes to have two shades of color (top and bottom). Also, read the directions.... I didn't notice the small paper until I finish my regiment. The company instructs NOT TO use right after brushing (They don't explain why, I'm guessing it can damage your anemole. It also says don't use longer than two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Strips!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on these terrible strips!!! You can barely remove them from the plastic card, as they are extremely sticky and slippery. If you are able to remove them, placing them on your teeth is a joke. They slide all over the place and don't stay in place!!! When you remove them - good luck. They disintegrate and then leave blobs of product on your teeth that requires vigorous removal with your toothbrush. Then...they aren't "eligible" for return through Amazon. Go with the Bright White Lovely Smile Premium Line strips...WAY BETTER!! They stay in place like super glue!
customer_reviews.author: T&J

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These do not work at all. They also leave the whitening gel on your teeth very sticky!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money! When you remove them from your teeth the whitening paste comes off onto your teeth and sticking to them in large blobs. SUPER GROSS!! I recommend spending a little more and getting Crest instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to use and had no weird residue. I could see a difference after four or five uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They actually work
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be working I have about 6 left out of 28 & someone complimented me on how white my teeth were! Great price & they work!
customer_reviews.author: S. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help much.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't hardly work. I'm moving up to the heavy duty dentist-grade gel (that is so strong people complain it burns your gums--I know that works). Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: msSera

customer_reviews.title: Will pay more next time for better product
customer_reviews.text: Initially they slide all over your teeth till you get them to stick. Then when it's time to take them off there is a sticky, gummy film all over your teeth. I have seen some whiting results but these are just a mess. Won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Leaves streaks on teeth.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Don’t waste your time or money. Leaves streaks on your teeth and lots of gooey junk from the strips.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna B

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Effective whitening at a much better price than the big brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noticed a difference the first day..
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a difference the first day... Easy to use, very minty... Will use again
customer_reviews.author: chicagobearsfan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price, teeth whitening toothpaste work just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Holley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you :)
customer_reviews.text: This product is very helpful, it has helped whitened my teeth and i want to say thank to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Piertrisha

customer_reviews.title: have to brush teeth after use, but works and good price
customer_reviews.text: they are kind of cheap, and after i use them, i have to brush my teeth to get the stuff off. but considering how much cheaper these are compared to what you get at the store, I would buy them again. They do seem to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very bad results
customer_reviews.text: My teeth looked more yellow than before. Used 10 of 14, then stopped. The teeth look yellowish with little white marks, like some uneven yellow-white color. After a while, I think they turned back to what they were (luckily).
customer_reviews.author: Helena S.

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several at home whitening products and this was one of my least favorite. Did not work for me at all. Strips did not stay in place well, formula was thick and hard to wash off teeth. It did not make my teeth sensitive but it also didn't whiten.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Foglia

customer_reviews.title: not happy with this item
customer_reviews.text: Film is so thin it is hard to keep in place
customer_reviews.author: Doc Titan

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: this prduct is very uncomfortable it covers front of your teeth area and not the sides .the gel also sticks to your teeth after use wash off easy but very uncomfortable only use this product once .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste
customer_reviews.text: The taste is beyond horrible. I don't know if they work because I can not force myself to try them long enough to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't tell any difference in my teeth. This product was a total wasre of my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Myers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: cheap product from China. Don't trust it and not going to us it.
customer_reviews.author: Ras Martin

product_meta.title: Advanced Teeth Whitening Strips - Professional Strength Whitestrips 14 Day Supply by White 360
